name: DexArbitrageFlashloan
description: !!! Never keep funds permanently on your FlashLoanReceiverBase contract as they could be exposed to a 'griefing' attack, where the stored funds are used by an attacker. !!!.

functionDecorators.name: executeOperation
functionDecorators.description: This function must be called only be the LENDING_POOL and takes care of repaying active debt positions, migrating collateral and incurring new V2 debt token debt.

parameterDecorators.name: assets
parameterDecorators.description: The array of flash loaned assets used to repay debts.

parameterDecorators.name: amounts
parameterDecorators.description: The array of flash loaned asset amounts used to repay debts.

parameterDecorators.name: premiums
parameterDecorators.description: The array of premiums incurred as additional debts.

parameterDecorators.name: initiator
parameterDecorators.description: The address that initiated the flash loan, unused.

parameterDecorators.name: params
parameterDecorators.description: The byte array containing, in this case, the arrays of aTokens and aTokenAmounts.
